mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the monthly sections entitled "On the Record", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", Idea Corral", and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). This edition also contains the articles "There's no Age in Square Dancing", "The Square Dancers' Summer", "Report from Callers' Meeting", "One Easy lesson", "Western Association Fete New Officers", and "We're on the Map, or, To the Rescue".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
